thread.title: Kim Kardashian, Kanye West and Kourtney Kardashian followed by KUWTK cameras for family meal in LA
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian, Kanye West and Kourtney Kardashian followed by KUWTK cameras for family meal in LA

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Kim Kardashian, Kanye West and Kourtney Kardashian followed by KUWTK cameras for family meal in LA
text:
Showbiz Kim Kardashian, Kanye West and Kourtney Kardashian followed by KUWTK cameras for family meal in LA The trio appeared to be in good spirits as they enjoyed a bite to eat on Wednesday afternoon Share The trio grabbed a bite to eat in Calabasas (Photo: X17Online) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Kardashian has only just returned from Dubai, but it was already straight back to business in Los Angeles for the reality star. 
The mum-of-two was joined by hubby Kanye West and sister Kourtney as Keeping Up With The Kardashians cameras filmed them enjoying a bite to eat at Hugo's restaurant. 
Kim, 36, opted for a rather low-key look made up of light denim ripped jeans, Yeezy Season 2 tan boots, a white T-shirt and a black and red plaid shirt for the outing. 
Instead, it was yummy mummy Kourtney who really stole the show in an all-white look that featured a tummy-baring top, white jeans and a long white jacket. 
She paired the look witih Yeezy perspex heels and rounded showbiz sunnies. 
Kanye, 39, was also sporting ripped jeans which he teamed with a light grey hooded sweater and white trainers. Kourtney Kardashian (Photo: Juliano-Daddy/X17online.com) Kim Kardashian leaves lunch with hubby Kanye West and sister Kourtney Kardashian (Photo: Juliano-Daddy/X17online.com) 
The trio appeared to be in good spirts despite reports claiming Kim won't be getting any of her stolen jewellery back. 
The reality beauty had her Â£3.5million diamond engagement ring taken when she was robbed at gunpoint last October and it is thought the piece of jewellery would have now been "recut and sold off". 
A source told France's BFM TV that Kim "is unlikely to get the jewellery back". 
Whilst Jerome Guillochon, president of a French jewellers federation, added: "They separate the stone from the metal. On one hand, they will melt the metal, and on the other, they will usually cut the stones completely, in order to remove all markings or modify the shape. Because if there is a typical shape in exceptional jewellery, if there is a ring in the shape of a cushion, they can perhaps cut it in circles." Kim Kardashian leaves lunch with hubby Kanye West and sister Kourtney Kardashian (Photo: Juliano-Daddy/X17online.com) Kim Kardashian leaves lunch with hubby Kanye West and sister Kourtney Kardashian (Photo: Juliano-Daddy/X17online.com) 
Without alteration, the 36-year-old television personality's ring - which was a gift from Kanye - would have been easily recognised as it had the word 'Adidas' carved into it. 
And Guillochon believes the ring would have been altered using lasers before it was sold on the black market in Antwerp, Belgium. 
Two of those arrested - Aomar Ait Khedache and Didier Dubreucq - were reportedly living in the city since October and detectives believe they moved there so they could get rid of the jewellery as soon as possible. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
